rules_text: [i]Anticipate[/i] – {T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, Garos Aeronaut gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: [i]“Crius is my best friend for life. Together we take long journeys and alone he takes even longer naps.”[/i]
